steps.name: Then the quantity selector should be displayed
When the user clicks the + button
Then the quantity should increase by 1
When the user clicks the - button
Then the quantity should decrease by 1
And the minimum quantity should be 0

labels.name: story
labels.value: Display quantity selector when Add button is clicked
